name: Bashamel Pasta
description: A creamy pasta dish with homemade Bachamel sauce.
ingredients:
250g pasta

2 cups milk

4 tbsp butter

4 tbsp all-purpose flour

Salt and pepper to taste
steps:
Cook pasta according to package instructions.

In a saucepan, melt butter over medium heat.

Stir in flour and cook for 2-3 minutes until golden brown.

Gradually whisk in milk, stirring constantly until the sauce thickens.

Season with salt and pepper.

Combine the cooked pasta with the Béchamel sauce.

Pour into a baking dish and top with cheddar cheese.

Bake at 350°F for 20 minutes.

Serve hot and enjoy!

name: Mac and Cheese
description: A classic American dish of macaroni and cheese.
ingredients:
250g macaroni

2 cups milk

4 tbsp butter

4 tbsp all-purpose flour

Salt and pepper to taste
steps:
Cook macaroni according to package instructions.

In a saucepan, melt butter over medium heat.

Stir in flour and cook for 2-3 minutes until golden brown.

Gradually whisk in milk, stirring constantly until the sauce thickens.

Season with salt and pepper.

Combine the cooked macaroni with the Béchamel sauce.

Pour into a baking dish and top with cheddar cheese.

Bake at 350°F for 20 minutes.

Serve hot and enjoy!

name: Spaghetti and Meatballs
description: A classic Italian-American dish of spaghetti and meatballs.
ingredients:
250g spaghetti

1 lb ground beef

1 onion

2 cloves garlic

1 egg

1/2 cup breadcrumbs

1 tsp salt

1 tsp pepper

1 tsp paprika

1 tsp garlic powder

1 tsp onion powder

1 tsp oregano

1 tsp basil
steps:
Cook spaghetti according to package instructions.

In a bowl, combine ground beef, onion, garlic, egg, breadcrumbs, salt, pepper, paprika, garlic powder, onion powder, oregano, and basil.

Form into meatballs.

In a saucepan, heat tomato sauce over medium heat.

Add meatballs and simmer for 20 minutes.

Serve hot and enjoy!

name: Beef Burger
description: A classic American dish of a beef burger.
ingredients:
1 lb ground beef

1 onion

2 cloves garlic

1 egg

1/2 cup breadcrumbs

1 tsp salt

1 tsp pepper

1 tsp paprika

1 tsp garlic powder

1 tsp onion powder

1 tsp oregano

1 tsp basil
steps:
In a bowl, combine ground beef, onion, garlic, egg, breadcrumbs, salt, pepper, paprika, garlic powder, onion powder, oregano, and basil.

Form into patties.

Grill patties over medium heat for 5 minutes per side.

Serve hot and enjoy!

name: Beef Stew
description: A classic American dish of beef stew.
ingredients:
1 lb beef

1 onion

2 carrots

2 celery stalks

2 cloves garlic

1 tsp salt

1 tsp pepper

1 tsp thyme

1 tsp rosemary

1 tsp oregano

1 bay leaf

4 cups beef broth
steps:
In a pot, combine beef, onion, carrots, celery, garlic, salt, pepper, thyme, rosemary, oregano, bay leaf, and beef broth.

Cover and simmer for 2 hours.

Serve hot and enjoy!

name: Chicken Strips
description: Crispy chicken strips served with your choice of dipping sauce.
ingredients:
2 chicken breasts

1 cup flour

1 tsp salt

1 tsp pepper

1 tsp paprika

1 tsp garlic powder

1 tsp onion powder

1 tsp oregano

1 tsp basil

2 eggs

1 cup breadcrumbs
steps:
Preheat oven to 400°F.

In a bowl, combine flour, salt, pepper, paprika, garlic powder, onion powder, oregano, and basil.

In a separate bowl, beat eggs.

In a third bowl, add breadcrumbs.

Cut chicken breasts into strips.

Dip chicken strips in flour mixture, then egg, then breadcrumbs.

Place chicken strips on a baking sheet and bake for 20 minutes.

Serve hot with your choice of dipping sauce and enjoy!

name: Chicken Noodle Soup
description: A classic soup made with chicken, vegetables, and noodles.
ingredients:
2 chicken breasts

1 onion

2 carrots

2 celery stalks

2 cloves garlic

1 tsp salt

1 tsp pepper

1 tsp thyme

1 tsp rosemary

1 tsp oregano

1 bay leaf

4 cups chicken broth

1 cup egg noodles
steps:
In a pot, combine chicken, onion, carrots, celery, garlic, salt, pepper, thyme, rosemary, oregano, bay leaf, and chicken broth.

Cover and simmer for 1 hour.

Remove chicken breasts and shred with a fork.

Return chicken to pot and add egg noodles.

Simmer for 10 minutes.

Serve hot and enjoy!

name: Chicken Parmesan
description: A classic Italian-American dish of breaded chicken cutlets baked with tomato sauce and mozzarella cheese.
ingredients:
2 chicken breasts

1 cup flour

1 tsp salt

1 tsp pepper

1 tsp paprika

1 tsp garlic powder

1 tsp onion powder

1 tsp oregano

1 tsp basil

2 eggs

1 cup breadcrumbs

1 cup tomato sauce

1 cup mozzarella cheese
steps:
Preheat oven to 400°F.

In a bowl, combine flour, salt, pepper, paprika, garlic powder, onion powder, oregano, and basil.

In a separate bowl, beat eggs.

In a third bowl, add breadcrumbs.

Cut chicken breasts in half lengthwise.

Dip chicken breasts in flour mixture, then egg, then breadcrumbs.

Place chicken breasts on a baking sheet and bake for 20 minutes.

Top chicken breasts with tomato sauce and mozzarella cheese.

Bake for an additional 10 minutes.

Serve hot and enjoy!

name: Chicken Tikka Masala
description: A popular Indian dish of roasted chicken chunks in a creamy tomato sauce.
ingredients:
2 chicken breasts

1 onion

2 cloves garlic

1 tsp salt

1 tsp pepper

1 tsp paprika

1 tsp cumin

1 tsp coriander

1 tsp turmeric

1 tsp garam masala

1 tsp chili powder

1 tsp ginger

1 tsp garlic powder

1 tsp onion powder

1 tsp cayenne pepper

1 tsp cinnamon

1 tsp cardamom

1 tsp nutmeg

1 tsp cloves

1 tsp fenugreek

1 tsp mustard seeds

1 tsp fennel seeds

1 tsp curry leaves

1 tsp tomato paste

1 cup tomato sauce

1 cup heavy cream
steps:
In a bowl, combine salt, pepper, paprika, cumin, coriander, turmeric, garam masala, chili powder, ginger, garlic powder, onion powder, cayenne pepper, cinnamon, cardamom, nutmeg, cloves, fenugreek, mustard seeds, fennel seeds, and curry leaves.

Cut chicken breasts into chunks and coat with spice mixture.

In a saucepan, heat oil over medium heat.

Add onion and garlic and cook until softened.

Add chicken and cook until browned on all sides.

Add tomato paste, tomato sauce, and heavy cream.

Simmer for 30 minutes.

Serve hot and enjoy!

name: Chocolate Chip Cookies
description: A classic American cookie made with chocolate chips.
ingredients:
1 cup butter

1 cup sugar

1 cup brown sugar

2 eggs

1 tsp vanilla extract

2 cups all-purpose flour

1 tsp baking soda

1 tsp salt

2 cups chocolate chips
steps:
Preheat oven to 375°F.

In a bowl, combine butter, sugar, and brown sugar. Mix until well combined.

Add eggs and vanilla extract. Mix until well combined.

Add flour, baking soda, and salt. Mix until well combined.

Stir in chocolate chips.

Drop spoonfuls of dough onto a baking sheet.

Bake for 10-12 minutes.

Serve hot and enjoy!

name: Chocolate Lava Cake
description: A decadent chocolate cake with a gooey chocolate center.
ingredients:
1 cup butter

1 cup chocolate chips

1 cup sugar

1 cup brown sugar

4 eggs

1 tsp vanilla extract

1 cup all-purpose flour

1 tsp salt
steps:
Preheat oven to 375°F.

In a saucepan, melt butter and chocolate chips over medium heat.

In a bowl, combine sugar, brown sugar, eggs, and vanilla extract. Mix until well combined.

Add flour and salt. Mix until well combined.

Stir in melted chocolate mixture.

Pour batter into a greased muffin tin.

Bake for 10-12 minutes.

Serve hot and enjoy!

name: Chocolate Milkshake
description: A cold, sweet beverage made with chocolate ice cream and milk.
ingredients:
2 cups chocolate ice cream

1 cup milk

1/2 cup chocolate syrup
steps:
Combine chocolate ice cream, milk, and chocolate syrup in a blender.

Blend until smooth.

Serve cold and enjoy!

name: French Toast
description: A classic American breakfast dish of bread soaked in egg and milk and fried.
ingredients:
4 slices bread

2 eggs

1 cup milk

1 tsp vanilla extract

1 tsp cinnamon

1 tsp nutmeg

1 tsp salt
steps:
In a bowl, combine eggs, milk, vanilla extract, cinnamon, nutmeg, and salt.

Dip bread slices in egg mixture.

Fry bread slices in a pan over medium heat until golden brown on both sides.

Serve hot and enjoy!

name: Grilled Cheese
description: A classic American dish of melted cheese between two slices of bread.
ingredients:
4 slices bread

2 slices cheddar cheese

2 slices mozzarella cheese

2 slices provolone cheese

2 tbsp butter
steps:
Butter one side of each slice of bread.

Place one slice of bread, butter side down, in a pan over medium heat.

Top with cheddar cheese, mozzarella cheese, and provolone cheese.

Top with remaining slice of bread, butter side up.

Cook until golden brown on both sides.

Serve hot and enjoy!

name: Hot Chocolate
description: A hot beverage made with chocolate and milk.
ingredients:
2 cups milk

1/2 cup chocolate chips

1 tsp vanilla extract
steps:
In a saucepan, heat milk over medium heat.

Add chocolate chips and vanilla extract.

Stir until chocolate chips are melted.

Serve hot and enjoy!

name: Ice Cream
description: A cold, sweet dessert made with milk and sugar.
ingredients:
2 cups milk

1 cup sugar

1 tsp vanilla extract
steps:
In a bowl, combine milk, sugar, and vanilla extract.

Stir until sugar is dissolved.

Pour mixture into an ice cream maker and churn according to manufacturer's instructions.

Serve cold and enjoy!

name: Falafel
description: A popular Middle Eastern dish of fried chickpea balls.
ingredients:
1 cup dried chickpeas

1 onion

2 cloves garlic

1 tsp salt

1 tsp pepper

1 tsp cumin

1 tsp coriander

1 tsp paprika

1 tsp baking soda

1 tsp lemon juice

1 cup parsley

1 cup cilantro
steps:
Soak chickpeas in water overnight.

Drain chickpeas and place in a food processor.

Add onion, garlic, salt, pepper, cumin, coriander, paprika, baking soda, lemon juice, parsley, and cilantro.

Pulse until mixture is finely ground.

Form mixture into balls.

Fry balls in oil over medium heat until golden brown.

Serve hot and enjoy!

name: Lasagna
description: A classic Italian dish of layered pasta, meat, and cheese.
ingredients:
1 lb ground beef

1 onion

2 cloves garlic

1 tsp salt

1 tsp pepper

1 tsp oregano

1 tsp basil

1 tsp thyme

1 tsp rosemary

1 tsp paprika

1 tsp garlic powder

1 tsp onion powder

1 tsp cayenne pepper

1 tsp cinnamon

1 tsp nutmeg

1 tsp cloves

1 tsp fennel seeds

1 tsp tomato paste

1 cup tomato sauce

1 cup ricotta cheese

1 cup mozzarella cheese

1 cup parmesan cheese

1 cup lasagna noodles
steps:
In a saucepan, heat oil over medium heat.

Add onion and garlic and cook until softened.

Add ground beef and cook until browned.

Add salt, pepper, oregano, basil, thyme, rosemary, paprika, garlic powder, onion powder, cayenne pepper, cinnamon, nutmeg, cloves, fennel seeds, tomato paste, and tomato sauce.

Cover and simmer for 30 minutes.

In a baking dish, layer meat sauce, ricotta cheese, mozzarella cheese, parmesan cheese, and lasagna noodles.

Repeat layers until baking dish is full.

Bake at 350°F for 30 minutes.

Serve hot and enjoy!

name: Meatloaf
description: A classic American dish of ground beef and spices baked in a loaf shape.
ingredients:
1 lb ground beef

1 onion

2 cloves garlic

1 tsp salt

1 tsp pepper

1 tsp oregano

1 tsp basil

1 tsp thyme

1 tsp rosemary

1 tsp paprika

1 tsp garlic powder

1 tsp onion powder

1 tsp cayenne pepper

1 tsp cinnamon

1 tsp nutmeg

1 tsp cloves

1 tsp fennel seeds

1 tsp tomato paste

1 cup tomato sauce

1 cup breadcrumbs

1 egg
steps:
In a bowl, combine ground beef, onion, garlic, salt, pepper, oregano, basil, thyme, rosemary, paprika, garlic powder, onion powder, cayenne pepper, cinnamon, nutmeg, cloves, fennel seeds, tomato paste, tomato sauce, breadcrumbs, and egg.

Form into a loaf shape.

Bake at 350°F for 1 hour.

Serve hot and enjoy!

name: French Fries
description: A classic American side dish of fried potatoes.
ingredients:
2 potatoes

1 tsp salt

1 tsp pepper

1 tsp paprika

1 tsp garlic powder

1 tsp onion powder

1 tsp oregano

1 tsp basil
steps:
Cut potatoes into strips.

In a bowl, combine salt, pepper, paprika, garlic powder, onion powder, oregano, and basil.

Toss potatoes in spice mixture.

Fry potatoes in oil over medium heat until golden brown.

Serve hot and enjoy!

name: Onion Rings
description: A classic American side dish of fried onion rings.
ingredients:
2 onions

1 cup flour

1 tsp salt

1 tsp pepper

1 tsp paprika

1 tsp garlic powder

1 tsp onion powder

1 tsp oregano

1 tsp basil

2 eggs

1 cup breadcrumbs
steps:
Cut onions into rings.

In a bowl, combine flour, salt, pepper, paprika, garlic powder, onion powder, oregano, and basil.

In a separate bowl, beat eggs.

In a third bowl, add breadcrumbs.

Dip onion rings in flour mixture, then egg, then breadcrumbs.

Fry onion rings in oil over medium heat until golden brown.

Serve hot and enjoy!

name: Pancakes
description: A classic American breakfast dish of fried batter.
ingredients:
2 cups flour

1 tsp salt

1 tsp pepper

1 tsp paprika

1 tsp garlic powder

1 tsp onion powder

1 tsp oregano

1 tsp basil

2 eggs

1 cup milk

1 tsp vanilla extract
steps:
In a bowl, combine flour, salt, pepper, paprika, garlic powder, onion powder, oregano, and basil.

In a separate bowl, beat eggs.

Add milk and vanilla extract to eggs.

Add egg mixture to flour mixture.

Stir until well combined.

Pour batter onto a greased pan over medium heat.

Cook until golden brown on both sides.

Serve hot and enjoy!

name: Molten Cake
description: A decadent chocolate cake with a gooey chocolate center.
ingredients:
1 cup butter

1 cup chocolate chips

1 cup sugar

1 cup brown sugar

4 eggs

1 tsp vanilla extract

1 cup all-purpose flour

1 tsp salt
steps:
Preheat oven to 375°F.

In a saucepan, melt butter and chocolate chips over medium heat.

In a bowl, combine sugar, brown sugar, eggs, and vanilla extract. Mix until well combined.

Add flour and salt. Mix until well combined.

Stir in melted chocolate mixture.

Pour batter into a greased muffin tin.

Bake for 10-12 minutes.

Serve hot and enjoy!

name: Sherbet
description: A cold, sweet dessert made with fruit and sugar.
ingredients:
2 cups fruit

1 cup sugar

1 tsp vanilla extract
steps:
In a bowl, combine fruit, sugar, and vanilla extract.

Stir until sugar is dissolved.

Pour mixture into an ice cream maker and churn according to manufacturer's instructions.

Serve cold and enjoy!

name: Shrimp Scampi
description: A classic Italian dish of shrimp in a garlic butter sauce.
ingredients:
1 lb shrimp

1 onion

2 cloves garlic

1 tsp salt

1 tsp pepper

1 tsp oregano

1 tsp basil

1 tsp thyme

1 tsp rosemary

1 tsp paprika

1 tsp garlic powder

1 tsp onion powder

1 tsp cayenne pepper

1 tsp cinnamon

1 tsp nutmeg

1 tsp cloves

1 tsp fennel seeds

1 tsp tomato paste

1 cup tomato sauce

1 cup ricotta cheese

1 cup mozzarella cheese

1 cup parmesan cheese

1 cup lasagna noodles
steps:
In a saucepan, heat oil over medium heat.

Add onion and garlic and cook until softened.

Add shrimp and cook until pink.

Add salt, pepper, oregano, basil, thyme, rosemary, paprika, garlic powder, onion powder, cayenne pepper, cinnamon, nutmeg, cloves, fennel seeds, tomato paste, and tomato sauce.

Cover and simmer for 30 minutes.

Serve hot and enjoy!

name: Cheese Lovers Pizza
description: A classic Italian dish of pizza with cheese.
ingredients:
1 lb ground beef

1 onion

2 cloves garlic

1 tsp salt

1 tsp pepper

1 tsp oregano

1 tsp basil

1 tsp thyme

1 tsp rosemary

1 tsp paprika

1 tsp garlic powder

1 tsp onion powder

1 tsp cayenne pepper

1 tsp cinnamon

1 tsp nutmeg

1 tsp cloves

1 tsp fennel seeds

1 tsp tomato paste

1 cup tomato sauce

1 cup ricotta cheese

1 cup mozzarella cheese

1 cup parmesan cheese

1 cup lasagna noodles
steps:
In a saucepan, heat oil over medium heat.

Add onion and garlic and cook until softened.

Add ground beef and cook until browned.

Add salt, pepper, oregano, basil, thyme, rosemary, paprika, garlic powder, onion powder, cayenne pepper, cinnamon, nutmeg, cloves, fennel seeds, tomato paste, and tomato sauce.

Cover and simmer for 30 minutes.

In a baking dish, layer meat sauce, ricotta cheese, mozzarella cheese, parmesan cheese, and lasagna noodles.

Repeat layers until baking dish is full.

Bake at 350°F for 30 minutes.

Serve hot and enjoy!

name: Chicken Alfredo
description: A classic Italian dish of pasta with chicken and a creamy sauce.
ingredients:
1 lb ground beef

1 onion

2 cloves garlic

1 tsp salt

1 tsp pepper

1 tsp oregano

1 tsp basil

1 tsp thyme

1 tsp rosemary

1 tsp paprika

1 tsp garlic powder

1 tsp onion powder

1 tsp cayenne pepper

1 tsp cinnamon

1 tsp nutmeg

1 tsp cloves

1 tsp fennel seeds

1 tsp tomato paste

1 cup tomato sauce

1 cup ricotta cheese

1 cup mozzarella cheese

1 cup parmesan cheese

1 cup lasagna noodles
steps:
In a saucepan, heat oil over medium heat.

Add onion and garlic and cook until softened.

Add ground beef and cook until browned.

Add salt, pepper, oregano, basil, thyme, rosemary, paprika, garlic powder, onion powder, cayenne pepper, cinnamon, nutmeg, cloves, fennel seeds, tomato paste, and tomato sauce.

Cover and simmer for 30 minutes.

In a baking dish, layer meat sauce, ricotta cheese, mozzarella cheese, parmesan cheese, and lasagna noodles.

Repeat layers until baking dish is full.

Bake at 350°F for 30 minutes.

Serve hot and enjoy!

name: Chicken Curry
description: A popular Indian dish of chicken in a spicy sauce.
ingredients:
1 lb ground beef

1 onion

2 cloves garlic

1 tsp salt

1 tsp pepper

1 tsp oregano

1 tsp basil

1 tsp thyme

1 tsp rosemary

1 tsp paprika

1 tsp garlic powder

1 tsp onion powder

1 tsp cayenne pepper

1 tsp cinnamon

1 tsp nutmeg

1 tsp cloves

1 tsp fennel seeds

1 tsp tomato paste

1 cup tomato sauce

1 cup ricotta cheese

1 cup mozzarella cheese

1 cup parmesan cheese

1 cup lasagna noodles
steps:
In a saucepan, heat oil over medium heat.

Add onion and garlic and cook until softened.

Add ground beef and cook until browned.

Add salt, pepper, oregano, basil, thyme, rosemary, paprika, garlic powder, onion powder, cayenne pepper, cinnamon, nutmeg, cloves, fennel seeds, tomato paste, and tomato sauce.

Cover and simmer for 30 minutes.

In a baking dish, layer meat sauce, ricotta cheese, mozzarella cheese, parmesan cheese, and lasagna noodles.

Repeat layers until baking dish is full.

Bake at 350°F for 30 minutes.

Serve hot and enjoy!

name: Boiled Eggs
description: A classic American dish of boiled eggs.
ingredients:
2 eggs

1 tsp salt

1 tsp pepper

1 tsp paprika

1 tsp garlic powder

1 tsp onion powder

1 tsp oregano

1 tsp basil
steps:
Place eggs in a pot and cover with water.

Bring water to a boil.

Remove from heat and let sit for 10 minutes.

Drain water and place eggs in an ice bath.

Peel eggs and serve hot.

Serve hot and enjoy!

name: Apple Pie
description: A classic American dessert of apple pie.
ingredients:
2 apples

1 cup sugar

1 tsp vanilla extract

1 tsp cinnamon

1 tsp nutmeg

1 tsp cloves

1 tsp fennel seeds

1 tsp lemon juice

1 cup flour

1 tsp salt

1 tsp pepper

1 tsp paprika

1 tsp garlic powder

1 tsp onion powder

1 tsp oregano

1 tsp basil
steps:
Preheat oven to 375°F.

In a bowl, combine apples, sugar, vanilla extract, cinnamon, nutmeg, cloves, fennel seeds, and lemon juice.

Pour mixture into a pie crust.

In a bowl, combine flour, salt, pepper, paprika, garlic powder, onion powder, oregano, and basil.

Sprinkle mixture over pie.

Bake for 30 minutes.

Serve hot and enjoy!

name: Ice Tea
description: A cold, sweet beverage made with tea and sugar.
ingredients:
2 cups tea

1 cup sugar

1 tsp vanilla extract
steps:
In a bowl, combine tea, sugar, and vanilla extract.

Stir until sugar is dissolved.

Pour mixture into an ice cream maker and churn according to manufacturer's instructions.

Serve cold and enjoy!

name: Brownies
description: A classic American dessert of brownies.
ingredients:
1 cup butter

1 cup chocolate chips

1 cup sugar

1 cup brown sugar

4 eggs

1 tsp vanilla extract

1 cup all-purpose flour

1 tsp salt
steps:
Preheat oven to 375°F.

In a saucepan, melt butter and chocolate chips over medium heat.

In a bowl, combine sugar, brown sugar, eggs, and vanilla extract. Mix until well combined.

Add flour and salt. Mix until well combined.

Stir in melted chocolate mixture.

Pour batter into a greased muffin tin.

Bake for 10-12 minutes.

Serve hot and enjoy!

name: Chocolate Cake
description: A decadent chocolate cake with a gooey chocolate center.
ingredients:
1 cup butter

1 cup chocolate chips

1 cup sugar

1 cup brown sugar

4 eggs

1 tsp vanilla extract

1 cup all-purpose flour

1 tsp salt
steps:
Preheat oven to 375°F.

In a saucepan, melt butter and chocolate chips over medium heat.

In a bowl, combine sugar, brown sugar, eggs, and vanilla extract. Mix until well combined.

Add flour and salt. Mix until well combined.

Stir in melted chocolate mixture.

Pour batter into a greased muffin tin.

Bake for 10-12 minutes.

Serve hot and enjoy!

name: Chocolate Mousse
description: A cold, sweet dessert made with chocolate and cream.
ingredients:
2 cups cream

1 cup chocolate chips

1 tsp vanilla extract
steps:
In a saucepan, heat cream over medium heat.

Add chocolate chips and vanilla extract.

Stir until chocolate chips are melted.

Serve hot and enjoy!

name: Motzerella Sticks
description: A classic American side dish of fried cheese sticks.
ingredients:
2 cups cheese

1 cup flour

1 tsp salt

1 tsp pepper

1 tsp paprika

1 tsp garlic powder

1 tsp onion powder

1 tsp oregano

1 tsp basil

2 eggs

1 cup breadcrumbs
steps:
Cut cheese into sticks.

In a bowl, combine flour, salt, pepper, paprika, garlic powder, onion powder, oregano, and basil.

In a separate bowl, beat eggs.

In a third bowl, add breadcrumbs.

Dip cheese sticks in flour mixture, then egg, then breadcrumbs.

Fry cheese sticks in oil over medium heat until golden brown.

Serve hot and enjoy!

name: Shaweema
description: A popular Middle Eastern dish of spiced meat in a pita.
ingredients:
1 lb ground beef

1 onion

2 cloves garlic

1 tsp salt

1 tsp pepper

1 tsp oregano

1 tsp basil

1 tsp thyme

1 tsp rosemary

1 tsp paprika

1 tsp garlic powder

1 tsp onion powder

1 tsp cayenne pepper

1 tsp cinnamon

1 tsp nutmeg

1 tsp cloves

1 tsp fennel seeds

1 tsp tomato paste

1 cup tomato sauce

1 cup ricotta cheese

1 cup mozzarella cheese

1 cup parmesan cheese

1 cup lasagna noodles
steps:
In a saucepan, heat oil over medium heat.

Add onion and garlic and cook until softened.

Add ground beef and cook until browned.

Add salt, pepper, oregano, basil, thyme, rosemary, paprika, garlic powder, onion powder, cayenne pepper, cinnamon, nutmeg, cloves, fennel seeds, tomato paste, and tomato sauce.

Cover and simmer for 30 minutes.

In a baking dish, layer meat sauce, ricotta cheese, mozzarella cheese, parmesan cheese, and lasagna noodles.

Repeat layers until baking dish is full.

Bake at 350°F for 30 minutes.

Serve hot and enjoy!

name: Pickles
description: A classic American side dish of pickles.
ingredients:
2 cucumbers

1 cup vinegar

1 tsp salt

1 tsp pepper

1 tsp paprika

1 tsp garlic powder

1 tsp onion powder

1 tsp oregano

1 tsp basil
steps:
Cut cucumbers into slices.

In a bowl, combine vinegar, salt, pepper, paprika, garlic powder, onion powder, oregano, and basil.

Add cucumbers to vinegar mixture.

Let sit for 30 minutes.

Serve cold and enjoy!

name: Croissant
description: A classic French dish of croissant.
ingredients:
2 cups flour

1 tsp salt

1 tsp pepper

1 tsp paprika

1 tsp garlic powder

1 tsp onion powder

1 tsp oregano

1 tsp basil

2 eggs

1 cup milk

1 tsp vanilla extract
steps:
In a bowl, combine flour, salt, pepper, paprika, garlic powder, onion powder, oregano, and basil.

In a separate bowl, beat eggs.

Add milk and vanilla extract to eggs.

Add egg mixture to flour mixture.

Stir until well combined.

Pour batter onto a greased pan over medium heat.

Cook until golden brown on both sides.

Serve hot and enjoy!

name: Donuts
description: A classic American dessert of donuts.
ingredients:
1 cup butter

1 cup chocolate chips

1 cup sugar

1 cup brown sugar

4 eggs

1 tsp vanilla extract

1 cup all-purpose flour

1 tsp salt
steps:
Preheat oven to 375°F.

In a saucepan, melt butter and chocolate chips over medium heat.

In a bowl, combine sugar, brown sugar, eggs, and vanilla extract. Mix until well combined.

Add flour and salt. Mix until well combined.

Stir in melted chocolate mixture.

Pour batter into a greased muffin tin.

Bake for 10-12 minutes.

Serve hot and enjoy!

name: Cafe Latte
description: A hot beverage made with coffee and milk.
ingredients:
2 cups coffee

1/2 cup milk

1/2 cup chocolate syrup
steps:
Combine coffee, milk, and chocolate syrup in a blender.

Blend until smooth.

Serve cold and enjoy!
